name: angular2-start
description: Angular 2 starter project inspired by: Angular 2 Universal starter kit by @AngularClass

scripts.copy:src: npm run mkdist && cp -r src/assets dist/src && cp system.config.js src/index.html dist/src && find src/ -name '*.css' -exec rsync -R {} dist/ \; && find src/ -name '*.html' -exec rsync -R {} dist/ \;
scripts.less: find src/ -name '*.less' -exec lessc {} {}.css \; && find src/ -name '*.less.css' -exec bash -c 'mv "$0" "${0%\.less.css}.css"' {} \;
scripts.watch: npm run build && nodemon dist/src/server.js --watch src
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy:src && npm run less && tsc
